div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Performance Testing Best Practices

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Test Data Management
â€¢ Realistic data volumes
â€¢ Data variation strategies
â€¢ Privacy compliance
â€¢ Data refresh procedures
â€¢ Consistent test conditions

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Environment Management
â€¢ Production-like setup
â€¢ Isolated test environment
â€¢ Consistent configuration
â€¢ Resource monitoring
â€¢ Baseline establishment

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Results Analysis
â€¢ Statistical significance
â€¢ Trend identification
â€¢ Root cause analysis
â€¢ Performance bottlenecks
â€¢ Optimization recommendations

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: JVM Optimization

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
G1GC Configuration
â€¢ -XX:+UseG1GC
â€¢ -XX:+UseStringDeduplication
â€¢ -XX:G1HeapRegionSize=32m
â€¢ -XX:G1NewSizePercent=20
â€¢ -XX:G1MaxNewSizePercent=30

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Memory Configuration
â€¢ -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=1g-2g
â€¢ Graduated heap sizes
â€¢ -Xshare:off for testing
â€¢ Memory monitoring enabled
â€¢ Automatic cleanup triggers

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
HTTP Client Optimization
â€¢ Connection timeout: 10-30s
â€¢ Socket timeout: 30-60s
â€¢ Connection pool sizing
â€¢ Keep-alive configuration
â€¢ Retry mechanism tuning

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Gradle Performance Test Tasks

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Unit Test Task
./gradlew unitTest
â€¢ maxHeapSize: 2g
â€¢ maxParallelForks: CPU cores
â€¢ forkEvery: 0 no restart
â€¢ Performance: ~5MB, ~50ms each

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Integration Test Task
./gradlew integrationTest
â€¢ maxHeapSize: 6g
â€¢ minHeapSize: 2g
â€¢ maxParallelForks: 1
â€¢ forkEvery: 5
â€¢ Performance: ~50MB, ~500ms each

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
E2E Test Task
./gradlew e2eTest
â€¢ maxHeapSize: 8g
â€¢ minHeapSize: 3g
â€¢ maxParallelForks: 1
â€¢ forkEvery: 2
â€¢ Performance: ~500MB, ~3s each

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Performance Report Task
./gradlew generatePerformanceReport
â€¢ HTML report generation
â€¢ CSV data export
â€¢ Trend analysis
â€¢ Regression detection

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:

â€¢ Network latency impact
â€¢ Failover scenarios

span.p: Test Environment

Load Generators
â€¢ Multiple test machines
â€¢ Distributed load generation
â€¢ Network isolation
â€¢ Resource monitoring
â€¢ Coordinated execution

span.p:
Target System
â€¢ Production-like environment
â€¢ Realistic data volumes
â€¢ Same infrastructure
â€¢ Monitoring enabled
â€¢ Isolated from production

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Monitoring Stack
â€¢ Application metrics
â€¢ Infrastructure metrics
â€¢ Database performance
â€¢ Network monitoring
â€¢ Log aggregation

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Performance Thresholds

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
API Performance Thresholds
â€¢ Critical APIs: â‰¤ 500ms 95th percentile
â€¢ Business APIs: â‰¤ 1000ms 95th percentile
â€¢ Reporting APIs: â‰¤ 3000ms 95th percentile
â€¢ Batch APIs: â‰¤ 30000ms 95th percentile

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Database Thresholds
â€¢ Simple queries: â‰¤ 10ms 95th percentile
â€¢ Complex queries: â‰¤ 100ms 95th percentile
â€¢ Reporting queries: â‰¤ 1000ms 95th percentile
â€¢ Connection pool: under 80% utilization

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
System Thresholds
â€¢ CPU usage: â‰¤ 70%
â€¢ Memory usage: â‰¤ 80%
â€¢ Disk I/O: â‰¤ 80%
â€¢ Network: â‰¤ 80% bandwidth
â€¢ Error rate: â‰¤ 1%

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Performance Metrics

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Response Time Metrics
â€¢ Average response time
â€¢ 95th percentile response time
â€¢ 99th percentile response time
â€¢ Maximum response time
â€¢ Response time distribution

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Throughput Metrics
â€¢ Requests per second
â€¢ Transactions per second
â€¢ Data transfer rate
â€¢ Concurrent users
â€¢ Request completion rate

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Resource Usage Metrics
â€¢ CPU utilization
â€¢ Memory consumption
â€¢ Disk I/O
â€¢ Network bandwidth
â€¢ Database connections

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Error Metrics
â€¢ Error rate percentage
â€¢ Error types distribution
â€¢ Failed request count
â€¢ Timeout occurrences
â€¢ HTTP status codes

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

TestPerformanceMonitor

â€¢ Detailed reporting

TestPerformanceResourceManager

span.p: Performance Testing Tools

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Apache JMeter
â€¢ GUI and CLI execution
â€¢ HTTP/HTTPS testing
â€¢ Database testing
â€¢ Distributed testing
â€¢ Rich reporting

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Gatling
â€¢ High-performance testing
â€¢ Scala-based scenarios
â€¢ Real-time monitoring
â€¢ Detailed analytics
â€¢ CI/CD integration

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
K6 Performance Testing
â€¢ JavaScript scenarios
â€¢ Cloud and on-premise
â€¢ Developer-friendly
â€¢ Modern architecture
â€¢ API testing focus

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Artillery.io
â€¢ Node.js based
â€¢ WebSocket testing
â€¢ Socket.io support
â€¢ Lightweight
â€¢ Easy configuration

span.p: Performance Testing Strategy

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Load Testing
ðŸŸ¢ Normal expected load
â€¢ Baseline performance
â€¢ Response time validation
â€¢ Throughput measurement
â€¢ Resource utilization

span.p:
Stress Testing
ðŸŸ¡ Beyond normal capacity

â€¢ Recovery capability
â€¢ Error handling validation

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Spike Testing
ðŸ”´ Sudden load increases
â€¢ Traffic spike handling
â€¢ Auto-scaling validation
â€¢ Performance degradation
â€¢ System stability

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Endurance Testing
ðŸ”µ Extended periods

â€¢ Resource degradation
â€¢ Long-term stability
â€¢ Performance consistency
